title: Motor racing-List of Formula One constructors' champions
text:
Related: Motor Sports Motor racing-List of Formula One constructors' champions 
SOCHI, Russia, Oct 11 Formula One world championship-winning constructors since the title was first awarded in 1958: 2015 - Mercedes 2014 - Mercedes 2013 - Red Bull 2012 - Red Bull 2011 - Red Bull 2010 - Red Bull 2009 - Brawn GP 2008 - Ferrari 2007 - Ferrari 2006 - Renault 2005 - Renault 2004 - Ferrari 2003 - Ferrari 2002 - Ferrari 2001 - Ferrari 2000 - Ferrari 1999 - Ferrari 1998 - McLaren 1997 - Williams 1996 - Williams 1995 - Benetton 1994 - Williams 1993 - Williams 1992 - Williams 1991 - McLaren 1990 - McLaren 1989 - McLaren 1988 - McLaren 1987 - Williams 1986 - Williams 1985 - McLaren 1984 - McLaren 1983 - Ferrari 1982 - Ferrari 1981 - Williams 1980 - Williams 1979 - Ferrari 1978 - Lotus 1977 - Ferrari 1976 - Ferrari 1975 - Ferrari 1974 - McLaren 1973 - Lotus 1972 - Lotus 1971 - Tyrrell 1970 - Lotus 1969 - Matra 1968 - Lotus 1967 - Brabham 1966 - Brabham 1965 - Lotus 1964 - Ferrari 1963 - Lotus 1962 - BRM 1961 - Ferrari 1960 - Cooper 1959 - Cooper 1958 - Vanwall (Reporting by Alan Baldwin , editing by Ken Ferris) Trending On Reuters
